com.yantra.interop.japi

Interface YIFHTTPDataTransformer


  • public interface YIFHTTPDataTransformer
    This interface is responsible for transforming XML data to/from an HTTP transport in the SDF.

    A new instance of the class implementing this interface will be created with every HTTP method that is invoked.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beforeHTTPConnect(YFSEnvironment env, java.net.HttpURLConnection conn)
      Invoked prior to the HttpURLConnection being connected.
      void initRequestData(YIFHttpParams inputData)
      Invoked after construction to provide the input data and parameters.
      org.w3c.dom.Document readHTTPResponse(YFSEnvironment env, java.net.HttpURLConnection conn)
      Invoked after sending the HTTP request.
      void sendHTTPData(YFSEnvironment env, java.net.HttpURLConnection conn)
      Invoked after the HTTP connection is established.

    • Method Detail

      • initRequestData

        void initRequestData(YIFHttpParams inputData)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Invoked after construction to provide the input data and parameters. inputData
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • beforeHTTPConnect

        void beforeHTTPConnect(YFSEnvironment env,
                       java.net.HttpURLConnection conn)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Invoked prior to the HttpURLConnection being connected.

        The request method and headers will be set prior to this method being called. The HttpURLConnection#setDoOutput(boolean) will also be initialized to true on a PUT, PATCH, or POST, and false otherwise. The implementation may set any additional headers that are required, but it should not do anything to establish the actual connection (such as calling HttpURLConnection#getOutputStream()) env conn

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendHTTPData

        void sendHTTPData(YFSEnvironment env,
                  java.net.HttpURLConnection conn)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Invoked after the HTTP connection is established.

        The implementation should convert and serialize the data given in #initRequestData to the HttpURLConnection#getOutputStream() if HttpURLConnection#getDoOutput() is true. env conn

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readHTTPResponse

        org.w3c.dom.Document readHTTPResponse(YFSEnvironment env,
                                      java.net.HttpURLConnection conn)
                               throws YFSException,
                                      java.io.IOException
        Invoked after sending the HTTP request.

        The implementation should construct an XML Document and return it with the response data. It should also check for any error condition (such as non-2xx status) and throw a YFSException if needed. env conn YFSException IOException

        Throws:
        YFSException
        java.io.IOException
